text: EA is a leader in global Digital
entertainment we develop games for
mobile markets for PC markets and
console markets my focus is on the EA
franchises such as FIFA Madden and NHL
so we at EA always try and put the
customer first we try to provide our
Gamers the best possible experience we
can one of our challenges has always
been understanding the perspective of
how our customers are connecting to our
titles often we find users may not have
an ideal experience and we're left
wondering why we don't see why they had
a bad experience on our FIFA servers we
can only glean so much information from
console connections therefore the area
that was often blamed was the internet
in itself what the Amazon cloudwatch
internet monitor allows us to do is to
stitch together the quality of the user
experience versus the ISP quality into
the FIFA game servers internet monitor
allows us to identify ISP performance
fluctuations at the moment our Gamers
have a poor gaming experience internet
monitor also allows us to make better
data-driven decisions based on ISP
performance the complexities of
understanding internet performance can
often be a challenge for any
organization AWS has been a terrific
partner in helping us navigate these
challenges
out
